name: Pinochio
description:
Welcome to Pinochio. A classic Top Down Shooter - but there's a catch - every time you move Pinochio, he gets bigger, and easier to hit, if you chose not to move, well then, by the laws of gaming, you are prone to get hit. The aim is to maintain a Balance between the two. This is a submission to #BadaSoch GameJam.
